member.name: M:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataReaderExtensions.AsDataSet(ExcelDataReader.IExcelDataReader,ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataSetConfiguration)
member.summary: Converts all sheets to a DataSet
member.param: An optional configuration object to modify the behavior of the conversion
member.returns: A dataset with all workbook contents

member.name: T:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataSetConfiguration
member.summary: Processing configuration options and callbacks for IExcelDataReader.AsDataSet().

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataSetConfiguration.UseColumnDataType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to set the DataColumn.DataType property in a second pass.

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataSetConfiguration.ConfigureDataTable
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback to obtain configuration options for a DataTable.

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataSetConfiguration.FilterSheet
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback to determine whether to include the current sheet in the DataSet. Called once per sheet before ConfigureDataTable.

member.name: T:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataTableConfiguration
member.summary: Processing configuration options and callbacks for AsDataTable().

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataTableConfiguration.EmptyColumnNamePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the prefix of generated column names.

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataTableConfiguration.UseHeaderRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use a row from the data as column names.

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataTableConfiguration.ReadHeaderRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback to determine which row is the header row. Only called when UseHeaderRow = true.

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataTableConfiguration.FilterRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback to determine whether to include the current row in the DataTable.

member.name: P:ExcelDataReader.ExcelDataTableConfiguration.FilterColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets a callback to determine whether to include the specific column in the DataTable. Called once per column after reading the headers.

member.name: T:ExcelDataReader.Func`2
member.summary: Encapsulates a method that has one parameter and returns a value of the type specified by the TResult parameter.
member.typeparam: The type of the parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.param: The parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

member.name: T:ExcelDataReader.Func`3
member.summary: Encapsulates a method that has two parameters and returns a value of the type specified by the TResult parameter.
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates
member.param: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
